title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Cardano (ADA) Surges 58.8% as Nearly All Assets Rise
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Litecoin (LTC) was the only underperformer, falling 8.5% from Friday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3109.04, up 14.5% (+393.25) since 4 p.m. ET on Friday.

Nineteen of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: ADA (+58.8%) and XRP (+25.5%).

Laggards: LTC (-8.5%) and APT (+0.6%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: Nineteen of twenty assets in the CoinDesk 20 Index are trading higher with significant gains like ADA (+58.8%) and XRP (+25.5%), indicating broad market strength.
